description: Contains information about customers who purchase from Wide World Importers, including both retail and wholesale customers.

columns.name: CustomerID
columns.description: Primary key. Unique identifier for each customer.

columns.name: CustomerName
columns.description: Full name of the customer or business.

columns.name: BillToCustomerID
columns.description: Reference to the customer who receives the invoice (may be different from buyer).

columns.name: CustomerCategoryID
columns.description: Foreign key to Sales.CustomerCategories indicating the type of customer.

columns.name: BuyingGroupID
columns.description: Foreign key to Sales.BuyingGroups if the customer belongs to a buying group.

columns.name: PrimaryContactPersonID
columns.description: Foreign key to Application.People for the main contact person.

columns.name: AlternateContactPersonID
columns.description: Foreign key to Application.People for an alternate contact.

columns.name: DeliveryMethodID
columns.description: Foreign key to Application.DeliveryMethods for preferred delivery method.

columns.name: DeliveryCityID
columns.description: Foreign key to Application.Cities for the delivery address city.

columns.name: PostalCityID
columns.description: Foreign key to Application.Cities for the postal/billing address city.

columns.name: CreditLimit
columns.description: Maximum credit amount allowed for the customer.

columns.name: AccountOpenedDate
columns.description: Date when the customer account was opened.

columns.name: StandardDiscountPercentage
columns.description: Default discount percentage applied to orders for this customer.

columns.name: IsStatementSent
columns.description: Indicates whether monthly statements are sent to this customer.

columns.name: IsOnCreditHold
columns.description: Indicates whether the customer is currently on credit hold.

columns.name: PaymentDays
columns.description: Number of days allowed for payment after invoice.

columns.name: PhoneNumber
columns.description: Primary phone number for the customer.

columns.name: FaxNumber
columns.description: Fax number for the customer.

columns.name: DeliveryRun
columns.description: Delivery run identifier for route planning.

columns.name: RunPosition
columns.description: Position within the delivery run.

columns.name: WebsiteURL
columns.description: Customer's website URL.

columns.name: DeliveryAddressLine1
columns.description: First line of the delivery address.

columns.name: DeliveryAddressLine2
columns.description: Second line of the delivery address.

columns.name: DeliveryPostalCode
columns.description: Postal code for the delivery address.

columns.name: PostalAddressLine1
columns.description: First line of the postal/billing address.

columns.name: PostalAddressLine2
columns.description: Second line of the postal/billing address.

columns.name: PostalPostalCode
columns.description: Postal code for the billing address.
